ValidationRule.description: Confirmed rate on Reduction status cannot be greater than walk out rate
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Reduction'), OR ( NOT ( Confirmed_Rate__c < Walk_out_Rate__c ), Confirmed_Rate__c = 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Confirmed rate for Reduction status must be less than walk out rate
